charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F - In January 2010 in Sangamon County, defendants did knowingly conspire to distribute and possess with the intent to distribute heroin in violation of 21:846, 841(a)(1).

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 165 months imprisonment on Count 1, 60 months imprisonment on Count 2, to run consecutive to Count 1, and 120 months imprisonment on Count 3, to run concurrent to Count 1; 8 years supervised release on Count 1, 3 years supervised release on Count 2, and 2 years supervised release on Count 2, all to run concurrently; and $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - From in or about June 2009, and continuing to January 2010, the defendants knowingly conspired to possess with the intent to distribute and to distribute 100 or more grams of heroin in violation of 21:846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 165 months imprisonment on Count 1, 60 months imprisonment on Count 2, to run consecutive to Count 1, and 120 months imprisonment on Count 3, to run concurrent to Count 1; 8 years supervised release on Count 1, 3 years supervised release on Count 2, and 2 years supervised release on Count 3, all to run concurrently; and $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 18:924C.F - VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN - On or about January 6, 2010, the defendant knowingly possessed a firearm in furtherance of a drug trafficking crime as charged in Count 1, in violation of 18:924(c)(1)(A)(i).(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 165 months imprisonment on Count 1, 60 months imprisonment on Count 2, to run consecutive to Count 1, and 120 months imprisonment on Count 3, to run concurrent to Count 1; 8 years supervised release on Count 1, 3 years supervised release on Count 2, and 2 years supervised release on Count 3, all to run concurrently; and $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F - UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. - On or about January 6, 2010, the defendant, after previously being convicted of a felony, did knowingly and unlawfully possess a firearm in violation of 18:922(g)(1).(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 165 months imprisonment on Count 1, 60 months imprisonment on Count 2, to run consecutive to Count 1, and 120 months imprisonment on Count 3, to run concurrent to Count 1; 8 years supervised release on Count 1, 3 years supervised release on Count 2, and 2 years supervised release on Count 3, all to run concurrently; and $300 special assessment.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F - In January 2010 in Sangamon County, defendants did knowingly conspire to distribute and possess with the intent to distribute heroin in violation of 21:846, 841(a)(1).

21:846=ND.F - CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS - From in or about June 2009, and continuing to January 2010, the defendants knowingly conspired to possess with the intent to distribute and to distribute 100 or more grams of heroin in violation of 21:846, 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B).(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 262 months imprisonment; 8 years supervised release; and $100 special assessment.
